com.facebook.buck.parser.decorators

Class EventReportingProjectBuildFileParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.parser.api.ForwardingProjectBuildFileParserDecorator
      • com.facebook.buck.parser.decorators.EventReportingProjectBuildFileParser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProjectBuildFileParser, AutoCloseable

    public class EventReportingProjectBuildFileParser
extends ForwardingProjectBuildFileParserDecorator
    Decorator for ProjectBuildFileParser that is responsible for reporting parse lifecycle events like start and finish.

    This decouples status reporting functionality so that it can be used with different underlying ProjectBuildFileParsers.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.facebook.buck.parser.api.ForwardingProjectBuildFileParserDecorator
